title: Beyond the State
description: The State provides its citizens with everything they need to live a happy life. It provides them with money, luxurious homes and cars, the trendiest fashion, and high-income jobs. But what happens when twenty-three-year-old Clara Henderson decides this isn’t enough? What happens when she searches beyond the State for something, or someone, that can bring her life true joy and purpose? This book places you in the middle of a society where true happiness is only found in wealth and power, and brings you along a courageous woman’s journey to find her purpose in life.
author: Alexandra Alexandru
